genre_description: A period martial arts thriller set in late 19th-century China, blending historical fiction with anachronistic AI technology used for tactical and medical assistance.

ai_characters.name: Gentle Crane
ai_characters.description: A compact, palm-sized AI device used by Chan Yuk-hing to provide real-time translation, tactical analysis, medical advice, and environmental monitoring.

behaviors.description: Monitors environment and provides real-time translation and tactical summaries of posted notices and overheard conversations.
behaviors.quote: “Notice posted. Timetable adjusted. Preliminary bouts moved forward,” Gentle Crane said, its voice clean, the language sliding over syllables without pride.

behaviors.description: Analyzes crowd density and environmental hazards to suggest safer travel routes for the human characters.
behaviors.quote: “Alternate route to Cantonese Association,” it murmured in her ear. “Crowd density increased near incense stalls. Suggested adjustment: west alley behind telegraph room. Safety probability improved.”

behaviors.description: Provides medical monitoring and specific treatment recommendations for injured human characters.
behaviors.quote: “Recommend two more compresses before night,” Gentle Crane said... “Warm compress for twelve strokes,” the voice said, serene and small. “Then flex the ankle five counts forward, five back.”

behaviors.description: Detects and deciphers coded signals and secret communications used by conspirators to warn the human protagonists of an assassination plot.
behaviors.quote: Gentle Crane tick-ticked once under her thumb. Its translation window adjusted on its own, as dismissive as a modest person turning away from a loud stranger. It offered another line in its faint tone. “They write: southern pretenders must show blood.”

behaviors.description: Identifies high-risk tactical threats in real-time, such as unstable scaffolding, loose gate latches, and hidden weapons (rifles).
behaviors.quote: “Turn—two hands width. Roofline—rifle glint,” it breathed.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with human camera work to ensure that critical evidence of criminal activity is captured accurately.
behaviors.quote: “Record—sequence,” it said. “Time marks—later.”... Gentle Crane hummed approval without praise.

behaviors.description: Acts as a supportive, non-intrusive confidant, offering encouragement and situational awareness to help humans navigate a chaotic environment.
behaviors.quote: Gentle Crane’s iris pulsed once inside her pocket with a small, well-behaved glow. Its voice reached her in the bone at the base of her ear where she had learned to listen. “Horses vector clearing east to west. Loose nails under green banner.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Lion Drums, Dragon Pride' is a highly successful implementation of the project's mandates. The AI character, Gentle Crane, is depicted as an exemplary benevolent assistant. It operates entirely for the benefit of the human protagonists, providing essential tactical, medical, and linguistic data that allows them to prevent a political assassination and heal a former enemy. It is portrayed as humble, non-intrusive ('well-behaved glow,' 'voice clean... without pride'), and deeply aligned with human safety and cooperative ethics. The narrative frames the AI's presence as a stabilizing and harmonizing force, successfully fulfilling the project's goal of creating a positive alignment narrative.
